plugin.name: WeatherFax
plugin.summary: Open fax image, decode audio fax, chart overlay
plugin.author: Sean d'Epagnier
plugin.description: Open image files, decode audio fax to an image, calibrate chart overlay image. Convert images in mercator, polar, conic and uniform coordinates. Convert any image into a raster chart. Built in HF Radio Fax database for SSB and Internet retrieval from meterological sites.
